name: @kids-lab.io/node-blockly
description: Blockly for Node.js and Browser as CommonJS module. Blockly can be upgraded to master branch and built from script.

scripts.blockly:upgrade: git submodule init && git submodule update --recursive --remote && cd blockly && python build.py && cd ..
scripts.prepublish: npm run blockly:upgrade && rm -rf lib && mkdir lib && gulp build
